website_summaries.verdict: If you are only dealing with roundworms, this is a decent product that does not cost a lot of money.
pros: Works well for strays or cats that are pretty sick with roundworms
Causes your cats to pass the worms
cons: Cannot be given to kittens until they are at least 6 weeks old
Cats don't like the taste very well

customer_reviews.title: If your cat has roundworms, buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective. My cat was very sick (feline aids plus worms) go the point of me calling the vet to potentially put him to sleep. I have this to him yesterday, despite the warning not to give it to sick cats. Today, he is eating and meowing and moving about again. He passed a bunch of worms a couple of hours ago. It was disgusting, but I am very glad to say that THIS STUFF WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: CopperGrl

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick on our feral barn cat
customer_reviews.text: We have a feral barn cat that was acting like it had a worm issue. Since it's feral we can't exactly catch it and take it to the vet so we guessed at this treatment. We just mixed it in it's food and it didn't seem to mind and after the dosages were finished, the cat was back to acting normal so we're going to say it worked as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: this product worked great!
customer_reviews.text: My cat got sick and I saw th round worms! gross. So I purchased this and gave him one treatment (purchase a dropper if you do not have one, it does not come with one) and 2 weeks later I gave him the second treatment. One day after the first treatment he became more active. Soon after that his appetite returned and he gained a little bit of weight. He had also lost some fur and it has since grown back. I was very skeptical of ordering this online and thought I would have to go to a vet to cure him, but I was wrong, this product worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Get this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered. Seems to be of good quality. Had a rescue cat just full of worms, tried regular dosing & got no where. Added it to the water & after a few weeks - no more worms. Good stuff! No issues with shipping or packaging. I would recommend this item to others.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Only problem was that they didn't like the taste
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my wild barn cats. Only problem was that they didn't like the taste, apparently. I had to hide it in some meat to get them to take it. However, they seem to have gotten some relief from the worms and none had any bad side effects. Another little issue is that the bottle was a son-of-a-beagle to get opened.
customer_reviews.author: laura  a

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My new kitten came to me quite thin, with a red bottom and I saw parasites in her stool. Since I have had kittens for many years, I knew what was wrong with her. Rather that visiting a vet for something I obviously already knew, I ordered and administered this once and again about 3 weeks later, which is what a vet does anyway to treat the various life cycle of the parasites. This resolved the issue. Her bottom is a healthy pink now and I see no more worms in her stool.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen thater

customer_reviews.title: Kitten died
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived promptly in adequate packaging. The instructions were relatively clear. It would be helpful if an applicator of some sort was provided, such as a dropper. The kitten did not especially like the taste, but didn't complain either. Sadly our kitten died 8 hours after administering the medicine. This was a complete shock. His death including vomiting and convulsions. I cannot be sure that the medicine was related his death, but there was no other immediately obvious environmental trigger. I'm sharing in case anyone else encounters similar issues.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Daly

customer_reviews.title: Picky cats don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: The product is just awful. My cat refused to eat it by itself. She refused to eat it when mixed with wet cat food and tuna. We tried an oral syringe, she just gagged and spit it out. So we gave up on those methods. I drizzled it on her usual dry food and she ate it over a few hours, and now she is vomiting everywhere. I'm no expert but I don't think it will work too well if she can't keep it down.
customer_reviews.author: GMSqueaky

customer_reviews.title: Keep you $$ in your wallet...
customer_reviews.text: My cats hate it. They sniffed and ran away! Even when in their food! Tried force feeding it to them.... stitches on my arms and legs come out next week. Ok, just joking but you get the idea... They hate it..meh...
customer_reviews.author: SillySmile

customer_reviews.title: If my cat could review this she’d give it zero stars.
customer_reviews.text: My cat thinks it’s poison and refuses to take it. Now she thinks I’m trying to murder her.
customer_reviews.author: BreeG

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a stray cat I feed and care for because I found a round worm on my deck and noticed she had lost weight recently..We are on the 2nd dose after 14days and she seems to be doing much better..I have no way to know if their gone for sure but Id say the poor kitty is doing much better than before :)
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Worm Away
customer_reviews.text: After a failed brand of de-wormer I got this. Gave to cats once and the worms vanished. Mixed it with the canned food and yes, the cats sniffed knew something was added, ate tentatively but did eat all the food and medicine.
customer_reviews.author: Briscoe County

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well on the feral cats that eat in our area, easy to dose and causes no harm.
customer_reviews.author: K. G.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: It's very effective; but, I have to starve my cat before he'll eat the food with which it's mixed.
customer_reviews.author: David Eason

customer_reviews.title: Looks like this is working
customer_reviews.text: Looks like this is working. Had another one with identical ingredients, used it for the duration of 6 mo, but that one didn't work. Excel dewormer worked on my cats immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ari.M.

customer_reviews.title: Dead spaghetti!
customer_reviews.text: 1 of my inside only cats(I have 2) somehow got roundworms and puked up about 5 on my floor. *shudders* Ordered for next day delivery with my prime membership. Treated her AND my other cat, LESS than 24hrs later, worms in the poop in litterbox! Haven't seen any more since day 1, will administer again in 2wks.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I am happy I bought it and happy my cats are in ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this worm medicine to my cats in some warm milk, which they slurped down fast. I saw results in a few days and repeated dosage again in 30 days. Now my barn cats are worm free. I am happy I bought it and happy my cats are in a number 1 shape.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Works, cat ate mixed in food no problem.
customer_reviews.text: Cat ate it with no problem mixed in with its food and this cat is quite finicky...this is a feral cat we adopted and it came to us with worms when it first decided to adopt us. Since using this product, no more worm problem. Very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.R.

customer_reviews.title: It works, and my cat eats it mixed in food with no complaint
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it is as effective as prescription transdermal feline antiparasitics, but it is less than one tenth the price and my new kitten eats moist food with the recommended dosage mixed in with just as much gusto as untreated food. No digestive problems or other side effects seen. (14 week old Siamese kitten as recommended by the breeder).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lukacs

customer_reviews.title: My cats lived through it, the worms did not.
customer_reviews.text: The product did as advertised and left my cat (aged adult, adopted) and kitten (5 months) worm free. There did not seem to be a taste issue, I just poured dosage over individual food bowls and they ate it up. Shipping and amazon were wonderful as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Q.RanDumb

customer_reviews.title: Health warning for cats using this
customer_reviews.text: My cat immediately started vomiting (he puked four times throughout the day and night) and became extremely lethargic for over 24 hours. This has the chance of making cats very sick with the prescribed dose. I would take my cat to the vet instead of ever trusting this product again. I had to call Pet Posion Control over this. Not worth the scare or money. Use a vet instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works well, cats hate the taste. 🤣
customer_reviews.text: My cats hate it. Lol! But the product works. I use this product every spring. Like I said the cats hate it. I use a liquid syringe to inject it down their toothy snap traps. Bandaids immediately following.
customer_reviews.author: Lain

customer_reviews.title: Works when it stays down
customer_reviews.text: This product actually works like it claims. The down side is that it seems to cause nausea (or taste horribly) and the two cats we used it on both puked it up only minutes after taking it. It obviously can’t work if it’s been puked up so you have to wait and try again. Once they keep it down though it works really well!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Dragoo

customer_reviews.title: Not approved by the FDA...
customer_reviews.text: Apparently this drug has not been found by FDA to be safe and effective, and this labeling has not been approved by FDA. I purchased this item based on reviews + didn't think to do additional research. My cat experienced a severe negative reaction to this product including full body tremors. Took my cat to the vet and they recommended using the dewormer from Revolution as a safer alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It worked.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea about the flavor, my cat hated the treatment, but it worked! And it was like within the next day or two max that I noticed her stools appeared much more solid and “normal”. I took it as a sign the medicine worked.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Banks

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine —cat is difficult
customer_reviews.text: Ok my reviews are mostly because I don’t know how it tastes and my cat has not been very helpful in getting this into her without me being covered in brown liquid. Otherwise arrived quick and price was very good
customer_reviews.author: MikeAng07

customer_reviews.title: The Cats didnt even make a fuss
customer_reviews.text: This worked quickly and my cats did not mind the taste at all, no fighting to get them to take it once they realized it tasted good.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Illing

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to give directly in the mouth with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find this in stores, and when you do the price is very high compared to Amazon. Works quickly, did 2 treatments, and no more signs of worms. Easy enough to give directly in the mouth with a syringe (no needle)
customer_reviews.author: Jerzydeb

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain getting my cat to actually take the medicine. Even trying to mix it into his food he refused to eat it. Once we did get him to take it though it worked wonders. It had his wormed cleared up very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Cats liked it, but it didn't work for them
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this worked for my cats at all, which is a shame because they ate it without any issues. So, the flavor must be decent. I just put some mixed over hard food until it had been absorbed, then mixed that in with a can of wet food.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: It just takes a lot of the product to worm a kitten and they don't seem to enjoy the taste that much but it works well because 2 days after giving the recommended dose the kitten pooped out a whole dead roundworm.
customer_reviews.author: Sib

customer_reviews.title: Works well!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product on all my cats and even the community cats (they also had worms) and worked very well. One of my cats (who was a stray) vomited a little after having a dosage but it's normal.Because she threw up a bunch of the worms! After that she was clean of them.Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: karina

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 feral cats that seemed like they had worms but no one could catch them. I started feeding them and giving them doses of this. HUGE TURN AROUND! They've both put on weight and look much healthier than when they first came here!
customer_reviews.author: Titania

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, very effective!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my cats the night I got it in the mail and from what I could tell it took about 12 hours to work. My cats are indoor and outdoor so it could have worked faster than that. I am really happy with the product. I had to put it in a dropped and put it in their mouths, they wouldn’t just drink it.
customer_reviews.author: TraM

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: It for the most part works for wht you need it to work for. If you have a heavily infested cat you're probably in the market for something more than this though.
customer_reviews.author: Kid

customer_reviews.title: I guess it worked. My cat hasn't showed any further symptoms.
customer_reviews.text: I guess it worked. My cat hasn't showed any further symptoms. My cat didn't like the taste. Just mix it into their food.
customer_reviews.author: R Hill

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work pretty well and the cats don't "hate" the taste
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work pretty well and the cats don't "hate" the taste. It's super inexpensive so great if you are treating stray cats to give them a little help.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and works well for my cats worms. I have to force it in their mouths with a syringe, but it's worth not seeing worms coming out their @sses.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Need a lot
customer_reviews.text: The product did as intended. Unfort getting out cats to take it was a chore and for our big boy it was horrible bc of how much he needed.. I wish there is a product that is a small amount and easier..
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Our kitten is now horribly sick from this...
customer_reviews.text: Caused our kittens worms to increase in amount. Now has excessive, uncontrollable diarrhea as well. Worms and diarrhea everywhere. Trying to get ahold of an emergency vet now.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worked as needed
customer_reviews.text: One cat threw up roundworms so we dewormed all 3 cats about a month ago. We haven’t seen another one since!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: My cat loved the taste
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved the taste. She is small, so I'll get several uses from the bottle. Great price. Appears to have worked...but I'm not going to go digging through her poo to confirm.
customer_reviews.author: Asdf

customer_reviews.title: THEY ATE the food with it on it
customer_reviews.text: Too soon to know if it's 'working', but THEY ATE the food with it on it, which is a huge step up from them trying to bury their food when I used the last product for worms. LOL
customer_reviews.author: FrazzledByDaysEnd

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job well!
customer_reviews.text: Works well if dosed as described. My cat was not a fan of the taste though. He normally eats dry kibble but I treated him to some wet food to try to mask the taste & he wouldn’t eat all of it. What he ate definitely did the trick. Forever grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Minnamines

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, cats hate the flavor though
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well but my cats despise the flavor and of course they are fat so it was quite an ordeal getting them to take the dose. They need one with seafood flavor.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherLove

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work. :(
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to work at all. After three different doses, it had no effect on cat's round worm issue.
customer_reviews.author: tukatz

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Takes day to push all the worms out and cats didn't mind the taste. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: has worked great so far
customer_reviews.text: has worked great so far, my cat has stopped throwing up and i havn't seen any worms, so far so good :)
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Cat OK now
customer_reviews.text: Cat got fat afterwards so I guess he needed it.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I mixed this in with my kitty’s food and she ate it all up but even repeating the dose 2 weeks later as directed did not work
customer_reviews.author: SANDI

customer_reviews.title: My cat almost died.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions carefully and my cat almost died. Do not give this to your cat.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Camarena

customer_reviews.title: It Works & Easy To Give To Cats
customer_reviews.text: It is to give to cats and the cats like the taste of it vanilla flavor, and it does work if you follow the directions to the bottle
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA TRIGGER

customer_reviews.title: i imagine it must work. no problems
customer_reviews.text: I have to assume this stuff works. my kittens (feral born and rescued) seem to be healthy. Sassy little things.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Todd

customer_reviews.title: Product killed our kitten
customer_reviews.text: The cats didn’t care for this flavor. We followed the instructions perfectly, and within 2 doses, this product killed our kitten. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Worked great deworming a kitten that had round worms, great price to.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb H

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Kitten wandered up to our house, was full of fleas and worms so I bought this and used it once and the worms are gone!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Cats did not mind the flavor of this ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Cats did not mind the flavor of this medicine either. This bottle has been long-lasting as well, even in a household with 3 cats.
customer_reviews.author: oneladyeagle

customer_reviews.title: This Works
customer_reviews.text: Did the trick. I only needed to give cat Jeep two doses. Works
customer_reviews.author: Lauralee🌸

customer_reviews.title: ASSUME IT TAST GREAT TIC AND TAC LAPPED IT UP- OUR KITTENS
customer_reviews.text: KITTENS LICKED IT ALL UP. THEY WERE NOT SICK AFTER AND WE WILL SEE IF IT WORKED SOON
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat no longer has worms!!! What more could you ask for?!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works! The product got rid of my cat worms and now he's happy.
customer_reviews.author: Love Monet

customer_reviews.title: Eeehh.
customer_reviews.text: did not work , I did two doses as directed. I dont know if its my cat, the worms or me.
customer_reviews.author: carly

customer_reviews.title: ... my cat with milk and he has been doing good!
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this to my cat with milk and he has been doing good!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff... It works.
customer_reviews.text: Cats don't like it but it does it's job! Have t seen worms in weeks!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my Feral furbaby mixed it in his food . I give it to him every two weeks and it works .
customer_reviews.author: ANN

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I guess it works. The cats don't have worms now.
customer_reviews.author: MrsL2011

customer_reviews.title: Excel Roundworm De-Wormer For Cats
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years with great success.. I usually draw into a syringe (less needle) with the proper doseand squirt the dose into the mouth at the corner of the muzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Ely

customer_reviews.title: The cat ate its food!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat normally shys away from its dry food when we add medicine, not the case with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Leinberger

customer_reviews.title: It Must Taste Good...
customer_reviews.text: My two barn cats ate it up without a problem; I mixed with their regular can of cat food. You need to administer the first dose, then the second dose two weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: USNA2003

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work. My cat ate it, so at least it's tasty!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn C. Mancuso

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It's not working very well at all like given it to my cat three times and they still have worms
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Don't forget to give it to your kitty again in two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to give
customer_reviews.text: Works almost right away. Just hide it in my cats wet cat food he really devours down
customer_reviews.author: Mindi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is only working if given every week. The worms kept coming back.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well for my 2 kittens. They didn't care for the flavor but I liked that it was all safe and natural since they were too little for prescription strength dewormers.
customer_reviews.author: Katim

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my two outside feral cats. Seems to have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got rid of those worms chop chop praise the Lord
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works and apparently tastes good, to cats
customer_reviews.text: cat ate it quickly with little hesitation, worked after the second dose.
customer_reviews.author: E. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!!
customer_reviews.text: Product works well....just takes time. It took 4 treatments and a couple months but my furry orange buddy is parasite free!!
customer_reviews.author: ReturnedfromSaturn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This worked so well!!! Just keep cats close to the litter box as it did give them diarrhea
customer_reviews.author: Krysten Duquette

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, normally my cat spits out other roundworm ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, normally my cat spits out other roundworm dewormers, with this one he took it with no issues! great product would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great to have having two cats
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be working very well for my cats
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All 4 cats vomited all night!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used a product like this before with not problems at all. Gave correct amount and all my cats vomited!!!! I would not recommend at all!!!! Going to my local store now. Out $7!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Glad to be able to find what i need
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly. Product worked. Glad to be able to find what i need.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Beats a trip to the vet, rids your cat of round worms!
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to work. Gave my little guy a dose and repeated it as directed. I haven't seen him experience the same roundworm issues. I am of the belief that this remedied his infestation.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: My poor kitten had fleas when I rescued her and this ...
customer_reviews.text: My poor kitten had fleas when I rescued her and this worked like a charm to get rid of the worms she got from it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandyman

customer_reviews.title: This stuff sucks
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my cats mixed in with their food because I figured that was easier. Less than an hour later all of my cats were vomiting an obscene amount and this is the only thing that had been changed in their daily life. Absolutely will never buy again. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Trojan

customer_reviews.title: Cats didn't mind the taste and it got rid of the worms!
customer_reviews.text: Did the trick...no more worms and the cats didn't even mind the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Gave my cat explosive diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it worked or not. He really loved it...but it gave him explosive diarrhea...
customer_reviews.author: bethany

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Cat can't keep this stuff down, he throws it up immediately following dosage.
customer_reviews.author: smarty-pets

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My cat didn’t like the taste so I used a dropper to shoot it into his mouth. The very next day I found the worm in the litter box. It’s hard to imagine something that big was inside my little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beschler

customer_reviews.title: It worked after the first dose. I did give ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked after the first dose. I did give the kitten a 2nd and 3rd dose just to be on the safe side. Worked fast and was effective. The bottle is huge for just a kitten since only a small amount is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: Easy to administer to my three outside cats. I have used it twice and one cat looks better.
customer_reviews.author: Lolita Wike

customer_reviews.title: I poured the liquid over a couple morsels of food ...
customer_reviews.text: I poured the liquid over a couple morsels of food, and my kitten ate it right up. Within a couple hours, he had "relieved" himself of a HUGE knot of worms! He never got sick, gave him zero problems. Worked perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Laurienzo

customer_reviews.title: Easy remedy.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use. I added it to food that was given to a feral cat who regularly comes around in search of food. He appears to be much healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Mom

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great , but don't think the cat was happy about the taste!
customer_reviews.author: Richard V.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. It did the trick. Mixed it in with some canned salmon and the cat ate it right up. It would not drink the medicine plain.
customer_reviews.author: prettygirl357

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to use, cats ate it with no problem
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. After first dose no more worms in the stool. Did one more dose after two weeks (per the instructions) and no sign of worms since. Mixed it in with some wet food, cats ate it right up no problem. Wish they didn't add caramel coloring, but given how often unnecessary chemicals are added to both human and pet food guess I can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Sedita

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product says that it is tasty for cats but my cat doesn't think so
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Haacke

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product it killed the worms of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this product it killed the worms of my two cats and they look to like it. I had other kind of medicine but the cats will smell it and won't eat the food.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Kissimmee

product_meta.title: Excel Liquid Roundworm De-Wormer for Cats, 4-Ounce, Safe & Effective
feature_bullets: Safe and effective against large roundworms
